text: Russell Gardens is a village and a part of the Great Neck peninsula in Nassau County, New York in the United States. The population was 978 at the 2020 census. It is in the Town of North Hempstead. It is on the Great Neck Peninsula. Russell Gardens is located at (40.781063, -73.724996). ==References== Category:Villages in New York (state)
title: Russell Gardens, New York
